select ca_node_with_his_list.* from ( select distinct ca_node_with_role_list.*, history_list.file_length as last_commit_file_length, history_list.file_md5 as last_commit_file_md5 from ( select ca_node_list.*, group_concat(ca_node_list.single_role_type_id) as role_type_id, group_concat(ca_node_list.single_role_name) as role_name from md_file_node ca_node_list
and find_in_set(ca_node_list.is_pass_design,#{passDesign})
and find_in_set(ca_node_list.is_pass_check,#{passCheck})
and find_in_set(ca_node_list.is_pass_audit,#{passAudit})
and find_in_set(ca_node_list.is_design,#{isDesign})
and find_in_set(ca_node_list.is_ca,#{isCA})
and find_in_set(ca_node_list.is_commit,#{isCommit})
and find_in_set(ca_node_list.is_history,#{isHistory})
and find_in_set(ca_node_list.role_user_id,#{userId})
and find_in_set(ca_node_list.is_task_leader,#{isTaskLeader})
and find_in_set(ca_node_list.is_task_designer,#{isTaskDesigner})
and find_in_set(ca_node_list.is_task_checker,#{isTaskChecker})
and find_in_set(ca_node_list.is_task_auditor,#{isTaskAuditor})
group by ca_node_list.id ) ca_node_with_role_list left join md_list_storage_file_his history_list on (history_list.main_file_id = substring(ifnull(ca_node_with_role_list.main_file_id,ca_node_with_role_list.id),1,32)) left join md_type_action action_type on (action_type.type_id = history_list.action_type_id)
and find_in_set(action_type.is_ca,#{askCA})
and find_in_set(action_type.is_commit,#{askCommit})
order by ca_node_with_role_list.id,history_list.create_time desc ) ca_node_with_his_list group by ca_node_with_his_list.id

select sum(storage_tree.file_length) from md_tree_storage storage_tree inner join md_node_storage node on (storage_tree.id = substring(node.id,1,32))
storage_tree.deleted = 0
and (node.company_id = #{companyId})
and (node.project_id = #{projectId})
and (node.owner_user_id = #{ownerUserId})

select * from md_file file
and find_in_set(file.id,#{id})
and (find_in_set(file.server_type_id,#{serverTypeId}) or find_in_set(file.mirror_server_type_id,#{serverTypeId}))
and (find_in_set(file.server_address,#{serverAddress}) or find_in_set(file.mirror_server_address,#{serverAddress}))
and (find_in_set(file.base_dir,#{baseDir}) or find_in_set(file.mirror_base_dir,#{baseDir}))
and (find_in_set(file.read_only_key,#{key}) or find_in_set(file.writable_key,#{key}) or find_in_set(file.read_only_mirror_key,#{key}) or find_in_set(file.writable_mirror_key,#{key}))

select storage_tree.path as storage_path
,node.path ,company.company_name ,project.project_name ,task.issue_name ,task.issue_path ,task.task_name ,task.task_path ,account.user_name as owner_name
,range_type.type_name as range_name
,file.id as file_id ,file.file_type_id ,file.file_version ,file.file_checksum ,file.major_type_id ,file.main_file_id ,file.server_type_id ,file.server_address ,file.base_dir ,file.read_only_key ,file.writable_key ,file.is_pass_check ,file.is_pass_audit
,mirror.read_only_key as read_only_mirror_key ,mirror.writable_key as writable_mirror_key
,his.id as history_id ,his.last_modify_user_id as history_action_user_id ,his.action_type_id as history_action_type_id ,his.remark as history_remark ,his_account.user_name as history_action_user_name ,his_action_type.type_name as history_action_name
from
md_node node left join md_tree_storage storage_tree on (storage_tree.id = substring(node.id,1,32)) left join maoding_web_company company on (node.company_id = company.id) left join maoding_web_project project on (node.project_id = project.id) left join md_web_task task on (node.task_id = task.id) left join maoding_web_account account on (node.owner_user_id = account.id)
left join md_type_range range_type on (range_type.type_id = node.range_id)
md_tree_storage storage_tree
left join md_list_storage_file file on (storage_tree.id = file.id)
left join md_list_storage_file mirror on (mirror.deleted = 0 and mirror.main_file_id = file.id and mirror.server_type_id = #{request.fileQuery.mirrorServerTypeId}
and mirror.server_address = #{request.fileQuery.mirrorServerAddress}
and mirror.base_dir = #{request.fileQuery.mirrorBaseDir}
)
left join md_list_storage_file_his his on (his.main_file_id = storage_tree.id
and his.last_modify_time >= #{request.historyQuery.historyStartTimeStamp}
and #{request.historyQuery.historyStartTimeStamp} >= his.last_modify_time
) left join maoding_web_account his_account on (his.last_modify_user_id = his_account.id) left join md_type_action his_action_type on (his.action_type_id = his_action_type.type_id)
md_tree_storage storage_tree
(node.id = #{id})
(storage_tree.deleted = 0) and (storage_tree.id = substring(#{id},1,32))
limit 1

and find_in_set(substring(node.id,1,32),#{fuzzyId})
union all
select distinct node.* from md_node_range node
and find_in_set(substring(node.id,1,32),#{fuzzyId})
union all
select distinct node.* from md_node_task node
and find_in_set(substring(node.id,1,32),#{fuzzyId})
union all
select distinct node.* from md_node_storage node
and find_in_set(substring(node.id,1,32),#{fuzzyId})

select storage_tree.* from md_tree_storage storage_tree
left join md_type_range range_type on (find_in_set(storage_tree.type_id,range_type.sub_node_type)) left join md_web_task task on (storage_tree.task_id = task.id)
where (storage_tree.deleted = 0)
and (storage_tree.id = substring(#{id},1,32))
and (storage_tree.pid = substring(#{pid},1,32))
and (concat('/',task.project_name,'/',range_type.content,'/',task.path,'/',storage_tree.path) = #{path})
and (storage_tree.type_id = #{typeId})
and (task.project_id = #{projectId})
and (range_type.value_id = #{rangeId})
and (task.issue_id = #{issueId})
and (storage_tree.task_id = #{taskId})
and (task.company_id = #{companyId})
and (storage_tree.owner_user_id = #{ownerUserId})
and (concat('/',task.project_name,'/',range_type.content,'/',task.path,'/',storage_tree.path) = #{fuzzyPath} or #{fuzzyPath} like concat(concat('/',task.project_name,'/',range_type.content,'/',task.path,'/',storage_tree.path),'/%'))
and (concat('/',task.project_name,'/',range_type.content,'/',task.path,'/',storage_tree.path) like concat(#{parentPath},'/%'))
order by (length(replace(concat(concat('/',task.project_name,'/',range_type.content,'/',task.path,'/',storage_tree.path)),'/','//')) - length(concat(concat('/',task.project_name,'/',range_type.content,'/',task.path,'/',storage_tree.path)))) desc
limit 1
